name: STICK
description:
Made for: GDL - February Change Jam. https://itch.io/jam/gdl-feb-change-jam

Based the idea from a sketch i did this summer: https://www.instagram.com/p/BW5yOC3H0_A/?taken-by=markusgarvin

decider do take it a bit further. Surprised how well it works. Have not been able to play it to the end yet. I die in one of the later room.

first game jam  super happy with the experience and the result.

Special thanks to my brother who made all the Audio. https://soundcloud.com/tormod-garvin.

PS: MAC version has failed 2/2 times on different laptops, sorry. Will keep it here in case someone wants to try anyway.
